select * from t_app_company where id in
#{item.cid}

select t.* from t_app_company t left join t_app_user_company c on t.id = c.cid where t.status != 3
and name like "%${name}%"
and t.areaId in (${areaId})
and c.account = #{managerId}
group by t.id

select
from t_app_company where id in
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and status = 1

update t_app_company
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
areaId = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scale = #{scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
